input_text:
Job Title: Assistant Process Engineer

Location: Summit, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Job Number: 24-01192

Be part of a company that delivers life-changing healthcare solutions. Eclaro is looking for an Assistant Process Engineer for our client in Summit, NJ.

Eclaro’s client is a leader in the Biopharmaceutical Industry, providing quality, innovative, and affordable medicines that make a difference in the lives of patients all over the world. If you’re up to the challenge, then take a chance at this rewarding opportunity!

Position Overview: 

The Project Engineering Intern, will provide functional support within Global Capital Project Engineering (GCPE) in support of Project Engineering. In this role, the Project Engineer, will work closely with multiple functions such as maintenance, environmental health & safety, information technology, and procurement to utilize engineering and business skills to analyze, develop, and deliver technical solutions. The Intern, at the conclusion of the term will be expected to have experienced working in a global function, working across multiple functional areas to deliver technical solutions for either a project or business program:Business Organization. Good project management practices. Multiple aspects of engineering, construction, and facilities asset maintenance programs. 
Responsibilities: 

The Project Engineering Intern will participate within GCPE in support of project design and execution:Assist with the development and / or revision of project design deliverables. Prepare technical documentation and calculations in support of technical solutions and design standards. Work closely with technical subject matter experts in support of engineering activities. Provide support to manage engineering systems, digital tools, and applications across the engineering community. 
Qualifications:

College Undergraduate currently enrolled in Architecture, Engineering, Construction or Science Major. Currently enrolled in an accredited college / university during program calendar year. Completed at least 2 years of college / university to be eligible for the program. Must have a 3.0 GPA. Minimum availability of 12 weeks. Previous experience in some job duties listed, either through course work or industry / academia. Participation in student organizations and / or other leadership experience. Experience or Major / Career Focus in Facility Design, Construction Management, Maintenance and Operations. Experience with Microsoft Office Tools (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, MS Project, etc.). Knowledge of Autodesk systems and applications. Experience with Digital Applications preferred (SharePoint, Tableau). Experience in managing projects (including scholastic projects). 

If hired, you will enjoy the following Eclaro Benefits:

401k Retirement Savings Plan administered by Merrill LynchCommuter Check Pretax Commuter BenefitsEligibility to purchase Medical, Dental & Vision Insurance through Eclaro

If interested, you may contact:

Chris Imbien

Chris.Imbien@eclaro.com

(843) 872-9257

Chris Imbien | LinkedIn

Equal Opportunity Employer: Eclaro values diversity and does not discriminate based on Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
